about_the_game:
The album with the soundtrack to the "Cat’s Princess" was written to be sometimes mysterious, sometimes cute, sometimes warm and soothing, and quite the opposite. Everything to immerse the reader in the cozy kingdom of claws and paws. By purchasing the album, you will support the composer.
The following tracks are included:
1. Once Upon a Cat
2. Cat Princess
3. Diagon Tower
4. Tower Approach
5. Village
6. Cat Night
7. Lynx Charm
8. Unwilled
9. Grass
10. Yuumei
11. Calm and Paws
12. Nekomoon
13. Rion theme
14. Rion theme (last part)
15. Kitten Slinking
16. Nine Lives
17. Slanting gait
18. Stay Home
19. Last Spell
20. Cursed
21. Library Guy
22. D:
23. Hearth
Music composed by Shima Nori
